title: How sort list in python?
message:
I have this list

[1,-5,10,6,3,-4,-9]
But now I want the list to be sorted like this:

[10,-9,6,-5,-4,3,1]
As you can see I want to order from high to low no matter what sign each number has, but keeping the sign, is it clear?
